meanings.definition: A person who serves on a panel or discussion group.
meanings.sent1: The panelists shared their opinions during the discussion.
meanings.sent2: All the panelists were experts in their fields.
meanings.sent3: The panelists joked about their favorite topics during the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The panelists were like puzzle pieces, each fitting perfectly into the group.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the panelists' insightful comments.

meanings.definition: The members of a panel or discussion group.
meanings.sent1: During the event, the panelists sat at the front of the room.
meanings.sent2: The panelists listened attentively to the audience's questions.
meanings.sent3: The panelists decided to wear matching hats for fun.
meanings.sent4: The panelists were a rainbow of diverse perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The panelists' unity made a lasting impression on the audience.
